casebody.data:
No. 116. Montilla v. Vansickel et al. Motion for a reduction in the amount of the bond in an appeal taken from *578a judgment of the Supreme Court of Porto Eico to tile Supreme Court of the United States. Decided April 5, 1905. Messrs. Hartzell and Rodriguez Serra for petitioners; Mr. Acuña, for opponent.

Motion granted.
